name: Shoojump
description:
"Yes we are different, but lets help each other...  today."

2 player coop game, if you shoot the other player will jump!
But all of you have to reach the goal together.

Control :

  • Keyboard
    • WASD to Move Player 1
    • Space to Action Player 1
    • Arrow Key to Move Player 2
    • Right Shift to Action Player 2
  • Gamepad
    • Analog Pad to Move
    • Button A to Action

Objective : Activate all crystals!

Credit : Tim Bebas Terbatas

  • Yodi Pramudito (Programmer)
  • Frida Dwi Iswantoro (2D Artist)
  • Ranindra MK (Composser)

This game is part of Gr8ArtGames Game Jam - Jakarta
